name: Turbo Champ
description:
Play solo or with friends


Turbo Champ is a fast-paced, arcade racing game. Unlock unique cars in the single-player campaign mode or play local matches with your friends.

You can even play online via Remote Play Together for game with 2-4 players!

Exciting game modes


Compete against friends in a classic Race game, battle over possession of a diamond in Tag, witness the questionable Bad Taxi game mode, and more! Turbo Champ has five unique game modes to choose from!



You can play those games in quick matches, or in "Tournament" mode to prove you didn't just get lucky on that last match!

Explore new worlds



Zoom through the urban Downtown, descend the snowy Mountain, or zip through a lush Forest map. There are also battles to see in the Castle map, and new technology to witness out in the Space map.



Each zone has a distinct style and unique features to keep things interesting from game to game!
